headline: Health Care Funds Soar (a Measly) 29 Percent
abstract: In 2019, the industry’s performance was not quite as strong as the overall stock market’s. Some managers point to political uncertainty over health insurance and drug prices.
lead_paragraph: Until science beats death, disease and disability, the health care industry would seem a wonderful investment. Yet in 2019, it fell a bit behind the broader stock market.
keywords: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
